sections.title: Commitment
sections.content: Multiversity ensures equal access for learners, researchers, and educators. We strive to adhere to WCAG 2.1 AA guidelines, testing keyboard navigation and screen reader compatibility to ensure a seamless experience for all users.

sections.title: Recent Improvements
list: High contrast color scheme for improved readability.
Alternative text provided for all chapter and timeline images.
Keyboard navigation support for all interactive elements.
Semantic HTML structure for better screen reader navigation.

sections.title: Request Assistance
sections.content: Email accessibility@multiversity.netlify.app to report a barrier or request content in an alternative format. We aim to respond within five business days.
